page.title: 03HOUSING/LIFESTYLES SURVEY.
page.content: A group of us carried out a survey about the different lifestyles of peo- ple in the area.We interviewed 80 dif- ferent people. Between the 80 people they owned 121 cars.The most popular being Talbots, Vauxhalls and Escorts.Only 21 people had a video,20 were VHS,and 1 was BETA.43 people owned a Hi-Fi,and 75 had televisions.Between them they had 117 children,and 105 pets. The average age of people living in the area was 58.The average amount of years people had lived in the area was 7.People had moved to the area for the following reasons:for employment;they liked the country-side;cheaper house; nearer work;born in the area;approve of the area;and easier to get into the country. We asked people about their employment.Only 25 people had jobs,as
